name: Reference Pointer
description: This data type transmits information about data stored on another system. It contains a reference pointer that uniquely identifies the data on the other system, the identity of the other system, and the type of data.

fields.name: Pointer
fields.description: A unique key assigned by the system that stores the data. The key, which is a ST data type, is used to identify and access the data.

fields.name: Application Id
fields.description: Subcomponents: <namespace ID (IS)> & < universal ID (ST)> & <universal ID type (ID)>

fields.name: Type Of Data
fields.description: An ID data type that declares the general type of data. Refer to HL7 Table 0191- Type of referenced data for valid values.

fields.name: Subtype
fields.description: An ID data type declaring the format for the data of subcomponent <main type>. Refer to HL7 Table 0291 - Subtype of referenced data for valid values.
